title: Why does my CPU clock speed keep changing on Windows 10? - Quora

response.answer_text: It is part of the power saving system. If the processor is not working hard, it slows down, so saving energy. You should not notice any performance problems because of it. In most systems, this is controlled by the BIOS as part of the Energy Star program, and Windows is only reporting the slowdown, which can be overridden to a degree at your own risk by using this “hack”. :- How to Adjust CPU Frequency in Windows 10
